d1_text:
Npc0668:
ï¿½Since our imprisonment is now over,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I want to start on the Phase Distorter as soon as possible.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½...Oh, I almost forgot to thank you.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Thank you.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Don't worry about us.[PAUSE 15]  You've got important things to do...[HALT][CLR_FLAG EXIT_MOUSE_DISAGREEABLE]
[END]
